title: Qualitative Inquiry to Overcome Barriers in Reading English Academic Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading proficiency and foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized course for science job seekers/adult learners to analyze barriers and develop strategies for reading English academic texts.

learning_goals: Learners can grasp the contextual meaning of academic English texts without word-by-word translation
Learners can analyze the logical structure of scientific English papers in three or more stages
Learners can identify five or more personal barriers encountered while reading academic texts and develop resolution strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
